body_html: When i use the amd_gpu branch with a jupyter notebook, there seems to be a left over thread. python still uses 100% of one cpu, even after the computation has finished. Restarting the kernel finishes the stray thread. Does anybody else experience this?
body_text: When i use the amd_gpu branch with a jupyter notebook, there seems to be a left over thread. python still uses 100% of one cpu, even after the computation has finished. Restarting the kernel finishes the stray thread. Does anybody else experience this?
body: When i use the amd_gpu branch with a jupyter notebook, there seems to be a left over thread. python still uses 100% of one cpu, even after the computation has finished. Restarting the kernel finishes the stray thread. Does anybody else experience this?
